/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc   --expt-extended-lambda --expt-relaxed-constexpr -gencode=arch=compute_50,code=sm_50 -gencode=arch=compute_60,code=sm_60 -gencode=arch=compute_70,code=sm_70 -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/NVText.dir/src/NVText.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/NVText.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/home/dwendt/proj/custrings/cpp/build/lib  -L/usr/local/lib/librmm.so   -lcudart -lcuda
